sentences.en: ...a potpourri of architectural styles from all over the world.
sentences.cn: ...一种世界各地建筑风格的荟萃。

sentences.en: B: It'smells like a potpourri bag.
Even so, there is a slight odour of potpourri emanating from Longfellow.
sentences.cn: 纵然如此, 也还是可以闻到来自朗费罗的一种轻微的杂烩的味道.

sentences.en: No.6 : You smell like a walking bag of potpourri.
sentences.cn: 你闻起来像一整袋的干花.

sentences.en: Potpourri Green: Earthy and pale a neutral for kitchens and bathrooms.
sentences.cn: 混合绿: “既朴实,又给人以淡淡的感觉”,专为厨房和浴室准备的中性颜色.

sentences.en: Production made and drying potpourri etc. with decoration on pop bead flower and potpourri etc.
sentences.cn: 配以流行珠花、仿真花、绢花、干燥植物花、农家布玩等各种装饰,使产品流行且美丽.

sentences.en: The robust fragrance of potpourri filled the room.
sentences.cn: 大烩饭的浓香充满了整间屋子.

words.tran_cn: 百花香；混合物；杂曲；大杂烩

trans.tran_cn: <法>百花香（指放在罐内的干燥花瓣和香料混合物，能散发香味），（文学作品的）集锦，<音>集锦引曲，混杂物
trans.tran_en: a mixture of pieces of dried flowers and leaves kept in a bowl to make a room smell pleasant
